code:
json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "outDir": "build",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "noImplicitAny": true,
    "module": "commonjs",
    "target": "es5",
    "lib": ["dom", "es2015.iterable"],
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "rootDirs": ["src"]
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "build"],
  "tsBuildInfoFile": "build/tsconfig.json"
}
